data.title: The Best Washington DC Wedding Venues & Washington DC Wedding Reception Venue
data.meta_description: A top Washington DC wedding venue means the BEST reception spaces. See Carats and Cake's DC wedding venues list for your hotel, museum or any style wedding.
data.text:
Salamander Resort & Spa

Middleburg, Virgina

From equestrian elegance to southern sophistication, Salamander Resort & Spa provides a picturesque backdrop that brings your special day to life. We have a dedicated team here at Salamander Resort & Spa, to help you through the wedding…

The Hay-Adams

Washington, DC

The Hay-Adams is located across from the White House on a site once occupied by the residences of John Hay and Henry Adams. Their homes shared a reputation in their day as the social center of the Capital, and the magnificent hotel which replaced…

The St. Regis Washington, D.C.

Washington, DC

In a city of revered landmarks, the St. Regis Washington, D. C. stands out as a treasured address of uncompromising luxury and hospitality. Weddings take on a heightened air of distinction amidst the flowering oasis of the outdoor Astor Terrace…

Goodstone Inn & Restaurant

Middleburg, Virgina

Say 'I doî to a luxurious country wedding on 265 breathtaking acres in the heart of Virginia wine and hunt country. Unhurried and intimate, a Virginia destination wedding at Goodstone Inn & Restaurant means that you and your guests will…

Four Seasons Hotel Washington, DC

Washington, DC

The Four Seasons Washington has earned the coveted reputation for excellent service, and food and beverage. With the talents of our multinational culinary team, Four Seasons Washington is also recognized as the wedding venue of choice for couples…

Yours Truly DC

Washington, District of Columbia

A bohemian-inspired hotel; Yours Truly DC is located by Dupont Circle and warmly invites you to make yourself at home. From the moment you put down your bags, you want to feel settled and at ease. Here, you’ll find a DC hotel built and…

Potomac Point Winery & Vineyard

Stafford, Virginia

Potomac Point Winery is a Tuscan styled venue, nestled in the heart of Northern Virginia. Surrounded by rolling vineyards, Potomac Point is an all-season, full-service venue designed specifically for weddings. Every detail has been carefully…

Waldorf Astoria Washington DC

Washington, DC

Waldorf Astoria Washington DC is where meetings shape the world. Located at the heart of the city and steps away from America’s most important landmarks, discover 38,000 square feet of spectacular venues with exceptional capabilities and…

Sequoia

Washington, DC

Sequoia Restaurant is situated along the banks of the Potomac River, located in Georgetown. With glass windows from floor to ceiling your group will have magnificent views of the river, The Kennedy Center, Memorial Bridge, Roosevelt Island, the…

Long View Gallery

Washington, DC

Long View Gallery offers a modern gallery space as a beautiful backdrop for wedding day "I Do's". All visions can become realities at our location. Long View Gallery accommodates up to 175 guests for "I Do's" and up…

Events at Union Station

Washington, DC

Located just blocks from the Capital, Union Station serves as one of the most stunning and iconic wedding venues in Washington D.C. For over a century, this historic venue has been the arrival point in D.C. for presidents, dignitaries, and…

Fairfax Marriott at Fair Oaks

Fairfax, Virginia

Bring your wedding vision to life in our event venues or banquet halls at Fairfax Marriott at Fair Oaks Our professional planners can organize your seamless wedding ceremony and reception start to finish Keep your loved ones happy by having our…

The Mayflower Hotel, Autograph Collection

Washington, DC

The Mayflower Hotel, Autograph Collection is a wedding venue located in Washington, D.C. The historic boutique hotel’s storybook-like setting offers an idyllic backdrop for those starting their beautiful next chapter together. Combining style…

The United States National Arboretum

Washington, DC

The United States National Arboretum—garden and US Department of Agriculture research facility—stretches across 446 abundant acres of land. It’s home to well-known and loved flora collections, including the Bonsai Museum, the…

The Oak Barn at Loyalty, LLC

Leesburg, Virginia

We are proud to share our two-story farm venue that sits on 21 acres of rolling hills, vast pastures, and expansive wooded areas. Our Amish-built barn has indoor and outdoor spaces to accommodate events in every season. You can dance under the…

Rust Manor House

Leesburg, Virgina

Near downtown Leesburg, Virginia, nestled in a 68-acre nature sanctuary, Rust Manor House awaits your next event. Use the Manor’s parlor, foyer, dining room, library and surrounding gardens for your event or photography session. Close by is a…

Sofitel Washington DC Lafayette Square

Washington, Unite States

Toast to your happily ever after in our elegant and sophisticated venues here at The Sofitel Washington DC Lafayette Square. Let us make your wedding or social event the talk of the town in our glamorous Paris Ballroom, featuring a mix of historic…

The Bethesdan Hotel, Tapestry Collection by Hilton

Bethesda, Maryland

At The Bethesdan Hotel, Tapestry Collection by Hilton enjoy stylish spaces and resources you need for your next gathering. Keep you and your guests together by reserving 10 - 25 rooms instantly online.

Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel

Washington, DC

Ideally located in the heart of the city, Renaissance Washington D.C. Downtown Hotel is an unforgettable destination for your wedding. With 65,000 square feet of event space, you and your guests can enjoy an intimate gathering or large weekend…

The Westin Washington National Harbor

National Harbor, Maryland

The Westin Washington National Harbor is a beautiful wedding venue located on the waterfront of the National Harbor area. This property prides itself on its view, award-winning service, and staple catering. Minutes from DC and local attractions…

Hotel Washington

Washington, DC

Located in Washington, DC, Hotel Washington is a luxurious venue only steps away from The White House, the National Mall, and the Washington Monument. Luxe amenities and unparalleled sophistication come to life at Hotel Washington. Following a…

All Souls Church Unitarian

Washington, DC

All Souls Church, built in the 1920s, is a faithful copy of St. Martin-in-the-Fields of London. Our historic house of worship features a a bell cast in 1822 by Paul Revere's son and a Sanctuary that seats up to 700 guests amidst Corinthian…

Embassy Suites by Hilton Dulles North Loudoun

Dulles, Virgina

There are few occasions as memorable as your wedding day. Our Embassy Suites Dulles North hotel staff in Loudoun county, Virginia, will do our best to ensure every aspect of your wedding day is flawless. From seating arrangements to menus, we know…
